game_description: Rhythmic balls slashing game that will challenge your saber skills. Welcome to the surreal world where you stand to defend your island surrounded by water in the company of your friendly AI companion. It dances, it smiles, it wants to see you win.
review_1: My step uncle and my family were at a reunion and we played this game then he hit my grandma so hard he passed out and never woke up then my family was very upset. My step uncle never said sorry.
review_2: Beat saber clone but worse. Do not play
review_3: It’s a copy of beat saber Why would you copy an already good game and make it worse
review_4: I was scrolling thru app lab when I saw this I started playing it was amazing⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
